mean_cn: adj. 决断的；坚定而自信的
mean_en: expressing opinions or desires strongly and with confidence, so that people take notice
sentence: The head chef is very assertive and gives everyone clear instructions on what to do.
sentence_trans: 主厨是个非常决断的人，清楚地告诉每个人该做什么。
word_etyma: as加强 + sert加入，插入 + ive...的 → assertive断言的；确定的
